Html:
GC just made the announcement of having variable Luck of the Draw buff. Currently we have just a 5% buff.  However in 4.0.6 he is instigating a change that allows for up to 15% buff for 3 or more random pug members. Do you think we should change the buff to 15% or do you think we should keep the buff as is?

http://us.battle.net/wow/en/blog/2209011
Just do what we did for Strength of Wrynn.  Have 3 options, all mutually exclusive.
